name: Arrowpoint
description: Test your skill in this arrow shooting, leaderboard focused on-rails shooter. Set out on horseback, fire at challenging targets, and battle a giant, flying, cyborg whale! Can you reach the top of the leaderboard?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: An integrated graphics card Storage: 1500 MB available space Additional Notes: You can run the game on "Very Low" graphical settings with these specs. Lower your resolution if things are still choppy.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: A real graphics card Storage: 1500 MB available space Additional Notes: It's going to get pretty.
